extDescription.message: Visual validation of secure login pages via domain whitelists

officialListDescription.message: Official list maintained by the ShieldSign team, including the most popular web and cloud services. Enabled by default.

communityListsDescription.message: Add other public lists maintained by the community (optional)

enterpriseInfoText1.message: This feature is intended for enterprise administrators who wish to deploy a validated domain list for their collaborators.

enterpriseInfoText2.message: Domain format: Use the full format including subdomain and main domain (what appears between https:// and the first /).

enterpriseInfoSecurity.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è Security: Host your list on an internal or private server, not on a public URL.

enterpriseInfoFormatText.message: Use the full format including subdomain and main domain (what appears between https:// and the first /).

enterpriseListDescription.message: Add a single company-wide domain validation list (highest priority)

personalDomainsDescription.message: Add your own trusted domains (higher priority than community lists)

importExportDescription.message: Export your list to save it or import it on another browser

enterpriseModeDescription.message: Enable this option if you are an administrator and want to manage a domain list for your organization. This will display the "Enterprise Source" tab.

checkCNDescription.message: Display a warning if the certificate CN does not match the domain (Firefox only)

cacheDurationDescription.message: Frequency of automatic updates of remote lists (default: 24h)

aboutDescription.message: Visual validation extension for secure login pages via domain whitelists

contributorsText.message: Thanks to all ShieldSign project contributors

pageNotContainPasswordField.message: This page does not contain a password field

communityListDescription.message: Add other public lists maintained by the community (optional)

aboutDescriptionText.message: Visual validation extension for secure login pages via domain whitelists

aboutContributorsText.message: Thanks to all contributors of the ShieldSign project

aboutPrivacyText.message: ShieldSign does not collect any user data. All verifications are performed locally in your browser.

enterpriseInfoShort.message: Deploy a validated domain list for your teams. This list will have maximum priority and strengthen your employees' confidence.

modalWhyText.message: As an administrator, you can deploy a list of validated login domains for your organization. This list will have maximum priority over all other sources (community, personal). Your employees will see a distinctive green banner on pages validated by the enterprise, strengthening their trust.

modalSecurityPoint1.message: Phishing: Your employees will not see the validation banner on fake sites

modalSecurityPoint2.message: Man-in-the-Middle: Only authentic domains from your list will be validated

modalSecurityPoint3.message: Identity Spoofing: The enterprise banner clearly indicates this is an approved site

modalFormatText.message: Use only the full domain (subdomain + main domain), without protocol or path:

modalHostingWarning.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è DO NOT host on GitHub, GitLab, or any public service!

modalHostingText.message: To maximize security, host your JSON list on:

modalHostingOption1.message: Internal server only (accessible only from your enterprise network)

modalHostingOption2.message: Obfuscated URL: Use a GUID for the filename and folder

modalMaintenanceText.message: Keep your list up to date by adding new login domains used by your organization (SSO, internal portals, SaaS applications, etc.).

popupNoPasswordField.message: This page does not contain a password field

popupUnknown.message: This page contains a password field but is not listed in any trusted source

validationSecurityDescription.message: ShieldSign displays a banner on login pages to make them visible. Warning: a phishing site can also display a fake banner. To allow you to verify in 1 second that the banner is authentic, choose a verification method below.

antiPhishingExplanation.message: If ShieldSign becomes popular, an attacker could create a fake green banner on their phishing page. These options make imitation impossible because only YOUR extension knows your personal keyword, your daily code, or your custom colors.

modeBadgeOnlyDescription.message: No visible banner. A colored dot appears on the extension icon in the toolbar. Simple and non-intrusive.

modeBadgeOnlyCon1.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è Requires looking at the extension icon

modeBannerKeywordDescription.message: The banner displays your custom keyword or phrase. Only you know this keyword, an attacker cannot guess it.

customKeywordHelp.message: Choose a word or phrase that's easy to remember but hard to guess (minimum 5 characters recommended)

modeBannerKeywordPro2.message: ‚úÖ Impossible to imitate without knowing your keyword

warningKeywordTooShort.message: The keyword must contain at least 5 characters

modeBannerCodeDescription.message: A unique 2-character alphanumeric code (e.g., A7, H4, 8R) is generated on each visit and displayed in the banner AND on the extension icon. Simply verify that both match.

currentCodeHelp.message: The code changes automatically every day. You can also regenerate it manually.

modeBannerCodePro4.message: ‚úÖ Perfect balance between security and simplicity

showUnknownPagesDescription.message: Enable to see a badge even on unlisted pages: üî¥ (suspicious page with password) or ‚ö™ (page without password).

bannerStyleDescription.message: Customize the appearance of each banner type (Enterprise, Community, Personal).

bannerStyleRandomNote.message: ‚ÑπÔ∏è In random mode, a new color/gradient is generated each time the banner is displayed.

popupCodeInfo.message: A unique random code appears in the badge and banner on each visit to confirm authenticity.

autoAddUnknownLabel.message: üîê When submitting a form on an unknown site:

autoAddUnknownAlways.message: Automatically add to my personal list

autoAddUnknownPrompt.message: Ask me if I want to add it

autoAddUnknownDescription.message: Choose how ShieldSign should react when you log in to a site that is not in any list.

notificationAddToPersonal.message: Add this site to your personal list?

notificationSiteAdded.message: Site added to your personal list

supportDescription.message: ShieldSign is a free and open source project. If you find this tool useful, you can support its development.

shareToFormsDescription.message: Paste your Google Form URL here (viewform page). The extension will automatically send domains from your personal list that are not already in the community lists.

shareToFormsNote.message: The first submission will automatically detect the form field if possible.

shareToFormsTipAbout.message: Tip: Paste the form URL here once, then click "Share" from this screen or from the Personal Sources tab.

toastFormUrlRequiredAbout.message: Please paste the form URL in About section

toastFormFieldDetectionFailed.message: Unable to automatically detect the form field. The extension will open the page for manual submission.

toastShareError.message: Error while sharing to Google Forms

confirmClearSharedHistory.message: Delete the history of locally shared domains?
